data.system_settings: Huawei P8 Lite, Android 6.0, v Alpha 3.3.8
data.actual_result: It gets a small visual bug were it doesnt show the server as selected but shows the chat
data.short_description: When you leave a server and rejoin it, the server wont be selected
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an instant invite to a server (You will need it) - Leave the server you have created the instant invite - Joint it again
